oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Samuel Pickens letter, June 1, 1864
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sameul Pickens
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Samuel Pickens, Camp Near Nashville, Tennessee, Co. A 3rd East Tenn Cav., to brother A.H. Pickens. ALS 3 pp. + envelope with stamp.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Civil wars;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Historical Photographs Copy Project (scan only; original returned to owner)
